content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  August 16 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB+' rating to The Western Union Company's $250 million senior unsecured floating rate notes due 2019. The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes. Fitch currently rates Western Union's $100 million additional 3.6% senior unsecured notes due 2022 'BBB+'. The additional 2022 notes are being issued under the same terms as the $400 million 3.6% senior unsecured notes du
